entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 24 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Temperature rising to minus 24 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 41 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:27 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:27 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023
